mapper.select: select b.br_name brName,mr_name mrName, r.br_id brId,r.mr_id mrId, mr_limit mrLimit,b.BR_LOCATION brLocation, mr_area mrArea, mr_network mrNetwork, mr_type mrType, e.emp_name empName, mr_location mrLocation, mr_img mrImg, LISTAGG(eq.eq_id,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY r.mr_id) AS eqId from branch b, meeting_room r, employee e,equipment eq where b.BR_ID=r.br_id and r.emp_id = e.emp_id and r.mr_id = eq.mr_id group by b.br_name,mr_name,r.br_id,r.mr_id,mr_limit,b.BR_LOCATION,mr_area,mr_network,mr_type,e.emp_name,mr_location,mr_img

select mr_id mrId, mr_name mrName, br_id brId, mr_limit mrLimit, mr_price mrPrice, mr_area mrArea, mr_network mrNetwork, mr_type mrType, emp_id empId, mr_location mrLocation, mr_img mrImg from meeting_room where mr_id = #{mrId}
mapper.insert: insert into meeting_room (mr_id,mr_name, br_id, mr_limit, mr_price, mr_area, mr_network, mr_type, emp_id, mr_location, mr_img) values (#{mrId}, #{mrName}, #{brId}, #{mrLimit}, #{mrPrice}, #{mrArea}, #{mrNetwork}, #{mrType}, #{empId}, #{mrLocation}, #{mrImg})
mapper.select: select emp_id empId, emp_name empName from employee where emp_level='L_2' or emp_level='L_1'
select br_id brId, br_name brName, br_location brLocation, br_tel brTel, br_img brImg from branch
select distinct regexp_substr(eq_id, '[^_]', 1, 1) eqId, mr_id mrId from equipment order by mr_id
